hibernate-mapping.query: select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.BusinessReport as reports order by reports.id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ContractTB reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ContractOSB reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id, reports.osb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ContractVSP reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id, reports.osb_id, reports.vsp_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ContractOKR reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id, reports.osb_id, reports.vsp_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ActiveUsersTB reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.ActiveUsersVSP reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id, reports.osb_id, reports.vsp_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.CountOperationsTBReport reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.CountOperationsSBRFReport reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.CountOperationsVSPReport reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.ITReport as reports order by reports.id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.CountPaymentDocsITReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.CountUsersDayITReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.QualityOperationPeriodITReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.CountOperationsDateITReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id, reports.operation_date
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.ProactiveReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id order by reports.tb_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.SystemIdleReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.it.SystemIdleAdditReport as reports where reports.report_id = :extra_id
select reports from com.rssl.phizic.business.ext.sbrf.reports.CountIOSReport as reports where reports.reportId = :extra_id
